title: Drawing, "George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Bathroom", early 20th century
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 520-8/ 3/4 & F.S./ RAND, J.B./ 8/10/34/ 8/30/34, 8/14/34, 4/ 8/30, 4; dimensions and instructions in graphite
description: Bathroom/closet designs with rectangular sink and vanity mirror at center of wall and shelving units at left and right. Shoe racks near floor of shelving units; pole near middle for hanging items. Curtain on track above units at left and right to conceal the space.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Bathroom", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-529.
